00020 /** \file
00021  \brief ECU database stuff
00022  */
00023 
00024 #include "ecudb.h"
00025 
00026 #include <stdio.h>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 
00029 #include "sqlite3.h"
00030 
00031 int createecutable(sqlite3 *db) {
00032     char create_sql[] = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ecu (ecuid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, vin TEXT, ecu INTEGER, ecudesc TEXT)";
00033 
00034     /// sqlite3 return status
00035     int rc;
00036     /// sqlite3 error message
00037     char *errmsg;
00038 
00039     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, create_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00040         fprintf(stderr, "sqlite error on statement %s: %s\n", create_sql, errmsg);
00041         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00042         return 1;
00043     }
00044 
00045     // Create the table index
00046     char create_idx_sql[] = "CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS IDX_VINECU ON ecu (vin,ecu)";
00047 
00048     if(SQLITE_OK != (rc = sqlite3_exec(db, create_idx_sql, NULL, NULL, &errmsg))) {
00049         fprintf(stderr, "Not Fatal: sqlite error creating index %s: %s\n", create_idx_sql, errmsg);
00050         sqlite3_free(errmsg);
00051     }
00052 
00053     return 0;
00054 }
00055 
00056 sqlite3_int64 getecuid(sqlite3 *db, const char *vin, long ecu) {
00057     char select_sql[] = "SELECT ecuid FROM ecu WHERE vin=? AND ecu=?";
00058     int rc;
00059     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00060 
00061     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, select_sql, -1, &stmt, NULL);
00062 
00063     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00064         fprintf(stderr, "Can't prepare statement %s: %s\n", select_sql, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00065         return -1;
00066     }
00067 
00068     if(NULL != vin) {
00069         sqlite3_bind_text(stmt, 1, vin, strlen(vin), NULL);
00070     } else {
00071         sqlite3_bind_text(stmt, 1, "", 0, NULL);
00072     }
00073 
00074     sqlite3_bind_int64(stmt, 2, ecu);
00075 
00076     sqlite3_int64 retvalue = -1;
00077 
00078     while(SQLITE_ROW == (rc = sqlite3_step(stmt))) {
00079         retvalue = sqlite3_column_int64(stmt, 0);
00080     }
00081 
00082     if(SQLITE_DONE != rc && SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00083         fprintf(stderr, "Error stepping select statement(%i): %s\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00084     }
00085 
00086     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00087 
00088     return -1;
00089 }
00090 
00091 sqlite3_int64 createecu(sqlite3 *db, const char *vin, long ecu, const char *ecudesc) {
00092     sqlite3_int64 foundecu = getecuid(db, vin, ecu);
00093     if(0 < foundecu) {
00094         return foundecu;
00095     }
00096 
00097     char insert_sql[] = "INSERT INTO ecu (vin,ecu,ecudesc) VALUES (?,?,?)";
00098     int rc;
00099     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00100 
00101     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, insert_sql, -1, &stmt, NULL);
00102 
00103     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00104         fprintf(stderr, "Can't prepare statement %s: %s\n", insert_sql, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00105         return -1;
00106     }
00107 
00108     if(NULL != vin) {
00109         sqlite3_bind_text(stmt, 1, vin, strlen(vin), NULL);
00110     } else {
00111         sqlite3_bind_text(stmt, 1, "", 0, NULL);
00112     }
00113 
00114     sqlite3_bind_int64(stmt, 2, ecu);
00115 
00116     if(NULL != ecudesc) {
00117         sqlite3_bind_text(stmt, 3, ecudesc, strlen(ecudesc), NULL);
00118     } else {
00119         sqlite3_bind_text(stmt, 3, "", 0, NULL);
00120     }
00121 
00122     rc = sqlite3_step(stmt);
00123     if(SQLITE_OK != rc && SQLITE_DONE != rc) {
00124         fprintf(stderr, "Error stepping ecu insert(%i): %s\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00125     }
00126 
00127     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00128 
00129     return sqlite3_last_insert_rowid(db);
00130 }
00131 
00132 int updateecudesc(sqlite3 *db, sqlite3_int64 ecuid, const char *ecudesc) {
00133     if(NULL == ecudesc) return 0;
00134 
00135     char update_sql[] = "UPDATE ecu SET ecudesc=? WHERE ecuid=?";
00136     int rc;
00137     sqlite3_stmt *stmt;
00138 
00139     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, update_sql, -1, &stmt, NULL);
00140 
00141     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00142         fprintf(stderr, "Can't prepare statement %s: %s\n", update_sql, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00143         return -1;
00144     }
00145 
00146     sqlite3_bind_text(stmt, 1, ecudesc, strlen(ecudesc), NULL);
00147 
00148     sqlite3_bind_int64(stmt, 2, ecuid);
00149 
00150     int retvalue = 0;
00151 
00152     rc = sqlite3_step(stmt);
00153     if(SQLITE_OK != rc && SQLITE_DONE != rc) {
00154         fprintf(stderr, "Error stepping ecu update(%i): %s\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00155         retvalue = -1;
00156     }
00157 
00158     sqlite3_finalize(stmt);
00159 
00160     return retvalue;
00161 }
